articles.author: Anwesha Mitra
articles.title: Saudi Arabia launches new airline, Riyadh Air to connect 100 locations by 2030 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The new carrier aims to leverage Saudi Arabia's strategic geographic location between the three continents of Asia, Africa and Europe and connect 100 destinations by 2030.
articles.content: Saudi Arabia has announced the launch of a new national airline to be led by industry veteran Tony Douglas. The new carrier aims to leverage Saudi Arabia's strategic geographic location between the t… [+1670 chars]
